main.name: Mathius Johnson
main.description: I love to work as a Full Stack Developer, Front End Developer or Back End Developer utilizing cutting edge technologies to make beautiful applications.
main.bio: I am an optimistic person with a can-do attitude, ready to take on any small or large challenge and have a fun time along the way. I enjoy every aspect of web development and am committed to enhancing my skills well enough to solve some big real-world problems. I finished my Diploma in Full Stack Web Development in 2020 and have been working as a Front End Web Developer, Apprentice Code Mentor and Code Project Evaluator since then.

education.degree: Diploma in Full Stack Web Development
education.description: 12 week bootcamp specializing in Javascript with React.js Front end and Express.js Back End, Intro to Ruby and Ruby on rails.
Intro to Front End Development with Javascript.

work.title: Project Evaluator
work.description: Provides constructive feedback to students for completed projects in the 12 week WebDevelopment Bootcamp. Evaluation of javascript fundamentals in projects built with node.js, express.js, andreact.js using custom hooks and reducer.

work.title: Front End Developer
work.description: Use of HTML, CSS with Tailwind and Bootstrap, jQuery DOM manipulation to buildmodules in C# DNN's 2sxc Content Editor. Development of a keen eye for detail and more advanced techniques with html, stylingand jquery with modals and carousels.

work.title: Apprentice Mentor
work.description: Part Time position responding to student assistance requests for the Full Stack WebDevelopment Bootcamp at Lighthouse Labs. Assisted students learning how to write and debug their code while building webapplications in Vanilla JS and JQuery with Express.js.

projects.title: Kuhner Shaker Digital Booth Product Chooser
Stack Social Networking App for Code Mentors
projects.category: Group project with react.js and express.js and custom reducer hook

projects.title: Interview Scheduler App
projects.category: React.js project using express.js backend, custom reducer hook and websocket

testimonials.text: Mathius is a friendly and resourceful person who was great to work with. He is always game to learn new things and is good at finding ways to solve problems on his own. When he worked with me, he was tasked with learning a lot of new technologies to complete real world projects and he took it all in stride. I would recommend Mathius.
testimonials.user: Aaron Lopex - Wolf X Machina Owner/Operator
